properties.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 11 at 12:17AM CST until January 11 at 12:30AM CST by NWS Houston/Galveston TX
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in League City has issued a

* Tornado Warning for...
Southeastern Harris County in southeastern Texas...

* Until 1230 AM CST.

* At 1217 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a
tornado was located over Hobby Airport, or over Greater Hobby Area,
moving east at 40 mph.

HAZARD...Tornado.

SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation.

IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without
shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed.
Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur.  Tree
damage is likely.

* This dangerous storm will be near...
Edgebrook Area around 1220 AM CST.
South Houston, South Belt / Ellington, Meadowbrook / Allendale,
Park Place and Harrisburg / Manchester around 1225 AM CST.
Deer Park, northern Clear Lake, Ellington Field and southern
Houston Ship Channel around 1230 AM CST.
properties.instruction:
TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest
floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a
mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter
and protect yourself from flying debris.

CMAMtext: NWS: TORNADO WARNING in this area til 12:30 AM CST. Take shelter now. Check media.
